pr_title: Add the key changes for the 1.12 release

timeline.message:
Add the key changes for the 1.12 release

Signed-off-by: Jakub Balhar <jakub.balhar@broadcom.com>

Minor language edit to 1.12

Signed-off-by: Andrew Jandacek <andrew.jandacek@broadcom.com>

timeline.bodyText: Implement request retrying for service instances
timeline.author: jandadav
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -2,6 +2,15 @@
 
 All notable changes to the Zowe API Mediation Layer package will be documented in this file.
 
+## `1.12.0`
+
+- Provide Zowe Authentication and Authorization Service (ZAAS) client
+- Refresh the static client definitions from the API Catalog UI
+- Switch to sso-auth instead of apiml-auth
+- Added logout endpoint api doc
+- Make jjwt only a test dependency
+- Fix order of fetching JWT from request
+

timeline.message:
Add the note about retry functionality

Signed-off-by: Jakub Balhar <jakub.balhar@broadcom.com>
